article:
Susan is very careless . She often loses her things.
It's time for the geography class. But Susan can't find her geography book in her schoolbag. She looks into the desk, and it's not there. "Oh, no!" Susan thinks. "Is it at home? Do I lose it? Where is it? I need it!"
Just then, the geography teacher, Mr. White, _ Susan's name. He gives her a geography book. And in the book, Susan sees a note:
Susan
I see the name "Susan" on the geography book. I find it on your seat.
Mrs. Smith, school bus driver
